articles.title: Looks like South Africa's vaccine queue jumpers will get away with it - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: South Africans who managed to game the system and receive their Covid-19 vaccines early can not be identified, the government says.
articles.content:
• People who are neither healthcare workers nor older than 60 have received their first doses of the Pfizer vaccine.
  • Some exploited system loopholes, and others just plain lied.
